column1: Local Foods////Local Foods is the best! I love their crunchy chicken sandwich and order it almost every time I'm here
column2: but they have many other great options on their menu that are healthy and flavorful. The sandwiches come with two sides - I usually get kettle cooked chips and fruit
column3: but their potato salad is also very good. The restaurant itself is very cute and there is plenty of seating inside and outside
column4: but it can get crowded at peak times. Parking is usually not an issue.
